changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on feature development and refactoring across multiple product teams (TPT, GOC, RTEVMS). Major themes include Contentful CMS integration for product content management, pricing and checkout improvements including OTP (One-Time Purchase) functionality, React 18 compatibility fixes, and code consolidation efforts to reduce technical debt.

features.name: OTP Statsig Event Tracking
features.description: Implements Statsig event tracking on checkout success for One-Time Purchase orders

features.name: Portion Percentage Experiment
features.description: Integrates tpt_portion_percentage experiment flag with Contentful keys for dynamic portion sizing

features.name: Price Per Serving Display
features.description: Adds price per serving calculations and display in reactivation pricing hook

features.name: Cart Surcharge Integration
features.description: Adds surcharge value handling into cart service function adapter

features.name: OTP Order Summary Logic
features.description: Implements order summary logic for Factor Form One-Time Purchase flow

features.name: Dictionaries Feature
features.description: Implements dictionaries functionality for TPT product

decisions.rationale: Make delivery intervals dynamic rather than hardcoded values
Consolidate currency formatting utilities to reduce duplication

decisions.what: Consolidate product family types for PetsTable
decisions.rationale: Standardize type definitions across pet product components

decisions.what: Update delivery source for reschedule delivery CDPS payload
decisions.rationale: Correct the source attribution for delivery rescheduling events

refactors.impact: Testing infrastructure for multipet checkout flow

refactors.reason: Reduce type duplication and improve consistency
refactors.impact: PetsTable component and related pet product features

refactors.reason: Eliminate deprecated utility in favor of standardized approach

entities.name: Contentful
entities.context: Multiple updates for content keys including entry names, portion percentages, key ingredients, and descriptions

entities.name: Statsig
entities.context: Event tracking integration for OTP checkout success

entities.name: CDPS
entities.context: Payload updates for delivery rescheduling events

entities.name: Reactivation Pricing
entities.context: Enhanced with price per serving calculations

key_patterns: Heavy use of feature flags for gradual rollout (tpt_portion_percentage experiment)
Contentful CMS integration pattern for dynamic content management across multiple features
Separation of pricing logic with dedicated hooks (useReactivationPricing)
Event-driven architecture with Statsig for analytics tracking
Adapter pattern for service integration (cart service function adapter)
Progressive migration from hardcoded values to dynamic configuration
Type consolidation efforts to reduce technical debt
React 18 compatibility updates addressing hydration issues
